pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared APOP_Quadrant = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("jZHBCsIwDIZfpew8oU6dehWZDJmKHscOZQtScO3o6kGf3jrS2ioDD38bSP/kS1qW0WQaxZHVTsoGw4MUgOEWagWsBz+sYrRSo9k/1gtrPdtwpEYZ48pciVGRC97yJ5CT4jWQXDhvGpZymXc5iq2SUYih8xc7RfRFiPDrctjUUq+MNqzBuc8g4Co1ZxqIlmQP0CF/dmMan2OtgNvufD5K4C0gYLdrXwYgBe97aMix66TSd8H1A594Zdww7gvWY8NgzjN/6KsX", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Qty Sign" = _t, #"Price Sign" = _t, #"Quadrant ID" = _t, Rating = _t, #"Rating Sort" = _t, Action = _t, #"Action Sort" = _t, #"Quantity Group" = _t, #"Price Group" = _t]),
  #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Qty Sign", Int64.Type}, {"Price Sign", Int64.Type}, {"Quadrant ID", Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Changed Type";
shared Replenishment_Method = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("i45W8g0KUNJRMlSK1YlW8k7MS0rMA3KNwVzfzDwF38QKIN8IzA/z9QSyTcBsv/wShYCcxLy81BSgmClEzBHINFOKjQUA", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Replenishment Method" = _t, Sort = _t])
in
  Source;
shared Country_Region = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Country Name" = _t, #"Country 2 Digits" = _t, #"Country 3 Digits" = _t, Region = _t]),
  #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Country Name", type text}, {"Country 2 Digits", type text}, {"Country 3 Digits", type text}, {"Region", type text}})
in
  #"Changed Type";
shared ABC_Class = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("i45WMlTSUXJUitWJVjICspzALGMgyxnMMgGyXCMCwGwzINsvv0TBsaAgJzM5MSknFSxsCtKWk5iXrRQbCwA=", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Sort Order" = _t, #"ABC-EXP Class" = _t]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Sort Order", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"Sort Order", Order.Ascending}})
in
  #"Sorted rows";
